akn:section.akn:heading: Policies for review of Federal research awards

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Assessment of policies Federal research agencies shall regularly assess, and update as necessary, policies, and practices to remove or reduce cultural and institutional barriers limiting the recruitment, retention, and success of groups historically underrepresented in STEM research careers, including policies and practices relevant to the unbiased review of Federal research applications.
